code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var setExpenses=function setExpenses(expenses){return{type:'SET_EXPENSES',payload:expenses};};export var startSetExpenses=function startSetExpenses(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/expenses',{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var expenses=response.data;if(Array.isArray(expenses)){dispatch(setExpenses(expenses));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var addExpense=function addExpense(expense){return{type:'ADD_EXPENSE',payload:expense};};export var startAddExpense=function startAddExpense(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/expenses',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(addExpense(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var editExpense=function editExpense(expense){return{type:'EDIT_EXPENSE',payload:expense};};export var startEditExpense=function startEditExpense(id,formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/expenses/".concat(id),formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){if(typeof response.data==='object'){dispatch(editExpense(response.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startTrashAndStarExpenses=function startTrashAndStarExpenses(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/expenses',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var expenses=response.data;if(Array.isArray(expenses)){dispatch(setExpenses(expenses));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};export var startDeleteTrashExpenses=function startDeleteTrashExpenses(formData){return function(dispatch){axios.put('/expenses_delete',formData,{headers:{'x-auth':localStorage.getItem('x-auth')}}).then(function(response){var expenses=response.data;if(Array.isArray(expenses)){dispatch(setExpenses(expenses));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
